KissCartoon API’s documentation¶

KissCartoon is an unofficial API for kisscartoon.io website. It’s written for Python 3, tested on Python3.6 and Python3.4

Installation¶

The package is on Pypi, so you can install it simply with pip install kisscartoon-api

Usage¶

See the Reference Guide page.

Need help?¶

If you have trouble using KissCartoon API, make a new issue on the GitHub page of the project or mail me at thyrst@seznam.cz

Issues¶

Bypass for anti-bot protection doesn’t work at 100%, so you’ll get a BlockedAccess error sometimes. I’m working on it.

TODOs¶

  • Sorting lists by sorts categories that are available on the KissCartoon site (Sort by alphabet, Sort by popularity, Latest update, New cartoon).
  • Logging in
  • Get download links of an episode (this will be a tricky one)

Contributing¶

For testing use pytest: pytest tests.py. Feel free to send a pull request.
